name: Ryane McLaine - Demo
description:
Demo of action arcade game with retro pixel graphics.

You can buy full version here: https://pyshteek.itch.io/ryane-mclaine

-Gamepad support
-Redefinable keys

-Complete objectives in 25 levels
-Destroy mechanic enemies with your gun
-Find door cards and escape trough exit doors
-Destroy control room with bomb
-Defeat 5 bosses
-Collect coins and upgrade your power and weapon
